lead_paragraph: Australian tennis great Rod Laver has wished Novak Djokovic luck in matching his feat of securing all four grand slams in a calendar year, a day after the Serb secured ownership of all four of the sport's major titles.
snippet: Australian tennis great Rod Laver has wished Novak Djokovic luck in matching his feat of securing all four grand slams in a calendar year, a day after the Serb secured ownership of all four of the sport's major titles....

headline.main: Laver Wishes Djokovic Luck With Grand Slam Bid
headline.print_headline: Laver Wishes Djokovic Luck With Grand Slam Bid
